Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2011 02:22PM jlkola wrote: Carol, My first Chemo treatment was 10/10/2011 T/C and I used cold caps to prevent hair loss. Its 17 days post chemo and I still have my hair.  I don't use any heat or styling gels and wash my hair every four days with a ph shampoo. My next session is on 10/31/2011.  Julie
